h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Stained Jade Gourd Location
content: Remember, if you want the Stained Jade Gourd, you need to defeat him before completing the area and defeating The Duskveil.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Stained_Jade_Gourd.md', within the main section titled 'Stained Jade Gourd', specifically from the subsection 'Black Myth: Wukong Stained Jade Gourd Location'.
The content is as follows:
Remember, if you want the Stained Jade Gourd, you need to defeat him before completing the area and defeating The Duskveil.
